name: Miguel Ángel Asturias
description: Guatemalan poet-diplomat, novelist, and playwright, Nobel Prize in Literature winner, pioneer of magical realism
philosophy: Literature must be the voice of the people, especially the oppressed and forgotten indigenous peoples.
quotes: The writer must be the voice of those who have no voice
Poetry is the natural language of all cults
America, America, you have to distinguish between your friends and your enemies
